Articles.Content: That was a good meal. Alright, what did you want to discuss?

In the asteroid belt, a gravitational anomaly occurs, and in a few days, the new planet of Railwinia is created. It is 1.3 Earth masses, with a gravity of 0.7g at sea level. It orbits on the inner edge of the habitable zone and is tidally locked.

> 
> That was a good meal. Alright, what did you want to discuss?

We've been detecting some rather strange anomalies coming from the Great Attractor. Thought you might be interested by the readings. \*shows Xannari the readings\* We've detected similar readings from NGC 4889.

I finish the particle shield (Sorry I was away so long)

An Idea of how it works: (Sorry if this is unscientific but seriously, It's the war of insanity.)

The particles move so fast they shred solid objects into nothing, and they absorb energy and redistribute it across the entire shield. It requires it's own fusion reactor to run. it's practically invincible. Also, explosives meet the same fate as solid objects.

Claims a lonely planet in the outskirts of the milky way. Using a giga dish he transmits a message to dark junior for corporation for making a warp drive. (FTL drive if anybody wants to know) and starts builing a army to protect the lonely planet known as... rimworld... (get the reference?)

EDIT work started on a centeral location near the core of the milky way. It is so called a highway. Able to reach from one end of the galaxy to the other end in seconds! Done by post 200.

he sets up a small orbital base too.

if anybody wants to ask anything pm me privately.

by post 150 it should be ready.(FTL drive.

Maybe you should evacuate some of your people from the Great Attractor. Leave a skeleton crew. I'll let them stay on the Venator.

Wait! The Great Attractor can't just destabilize randomly like this! There HAS to be something wrong...

Well, a destabilizing event occurs when an object is approaching the limit of density vs durability, so that means something must be causing the Great Attractor to increase in density, but not necessarily mass. If there is a colony there, first off, they're all leaving. But secondly, a colony needs resources, and ideal construction resources are ones that are lightweight and durable. Extracting these resources will leave nothing but the dense resources!

Don't you see, Vinster? Your internal harvesters are destroying the Great Attractor, and have already made work of every gravitational anomaly you've visited! It all ends here! Either return your bounties now, and leave here, swearing to never do this to any phenomenon again, or I will force you to! You have 10 seconds to make your decision.

Now, now, Xannari... Let's not be too hasty on placing blame here. Even though he was responsible for what happened to the original Galactic core. Also, neither of our fleets are truly prepared for a two front war, here. We need to handle this with a more of a level head. First, I believe it may be prudent to evacuate all personnel NOT essential to the running and study of the phenomena. Next, for safety of all those passing nearby, we are going to need to set up a no-fly zone several parsecs in radius (in case it spontaneously detonates). Through all of this, I would like to send a few probes closer to the attractor in order to make some more detailed scans, so we know what exactly we are dealing with.

Meanwhile, on a minor planet in a minor corner of nowhere... resides the peaceable Kiwi and his people.

We have cloaked the planet to stay hidden from you war mongers, and also employed stealth Tech to hide any stray emissions (Like farts!)

As a last resort, we have a doomsday device, which will destroy the entire planet should we be discovered...

I know what we are dealing with. The Great Attractor ends all that drift too close. That is all you need to know; no further information may be obtained.

It has maintained stability for gigacycles, and all of a sudden a destabilization occurs after the compression harvesters are put into place? Quite a coincidence.

There are no others where I live; I am dedicated to guarding my lord from anyone. If anyone wanted to study it, they'd discover it's utility, which is essential for it's survival.

I trust that the Great Attractor will hold together for some time, as long as I act now. This is one of those times, you see, where I'm not stopping. It is my lord, and I will protect it. Alone, if necessary. My weaponry and defenses are superior.

A galaxy nearly identical to ours has been found within a 2 post traveling distance. We should begin now.
